description:
THE HUMAN EYE AND THE COLORFUL WORLD

1. In this course you will be learning about the structure of human eye and the working of human eye.

2. The course duration is about 30 minutes

3. Complete video content is build with High quality 3D animations.

4. You can go through the e-book provided which covers all the topics involved in the

THE HUMAN EYE AND THE COLORFUL WORLD.

4. Its a crash course to learn about structure and working of human eye.
title: The Human Eye and the Colorful World
